segments.text: My boss wore a real stupid tie to work today . Can you guess why ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He isn't a man of good taste for clothes , is he ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He is , but I didn't mean that . His daughter bought him a tie as a Father's Day gift , and he was very happy to wear it and show it off to us in the office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It must be hard being a father .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it's great being a father , seeing your children growing up and loving you and admiring you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe you'll only feel that way on Father's Day .
segments.speaker: S2
